LocaleResource.Name: Customer.RegisterCustomer.BackgroundTask.Validation
LocaleResource.Value: Background task account can't be registered

LocaleResource.Name: Customer.RegisterCustomer.PasswordMinLength.Validation
LocaleResource.Value: Password must have at least {0} chars.

LocaleResource.Name: Customer.RegisterCustomer.PasswordAlphanumeric.Validation
